snippet: Bowing to pressure from fans and media, the Hall of Fame will allow Sydney Seau to be interviewed onstage, but not allowed to give a speech, when her father’s bronze bust is unveiled during an induction ceremony.
abstract: Pro Football Hall of Fame president David Baker says Sydney Seau, daughter of late NFL linebacker Junior Seau, can be interviewed on stage, not give a speech, during her father's induction ceremony.
lead_paragraph: Bowing to pressure from fans and media, the Hall of Fame will allow Sydney Seau to be interviewed onstage, but not allowed to give a speech, when her father’s bronze bust is unveiled during an induction ceremony.

headline.main: In Compromise, Pro Football Hall of Fame Offers to let Junior Seau’s Daughter Speak at Ceremony
headline.print_headline: Hall Presents a Compromise to Let Seau’s Daughter Speak
